level.text: All ground waters shall be classified as Class G1 until enough information that warrants a different classification is provided to or obtained by the Director and evaluated.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 4203, 4205 (July 2, 1993); renumbered by Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 1075 (March 4, 1994).
